backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing rooms, messages, moderation actions, reports, and user profiles with access control and message retention.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a no-change rebuild and redeploy, listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining routes for rooms, chat, settings, and login using TanStack Router, wrapped in ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageActi: Dropdown menu component providing mute, block, and report actions with a dialog for submitting reports.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Message composer handling authentication, profile readiness, message validation, and sending with error states.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageList: Renders a scrollable chat message list with auto-scroll, moderation filtering, timestamp formatting, and per-message actions.
Provides the main application layout with header, area display, routed content, and bottom navigation.
frontend/src/data/indiaStateCentroids.ts: Exports approximate latitude/longitude centroids for Indian states and union territories for closest-state calculations.
frontend/src/data/indiaStates.ts: Defines stable IDs and display labels for all Indian states and union territories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonProfile.ts: Loads or generates a persistent anonymous profile and provides an updater for storing changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAreaSelection.ts: Manages selected area state, persists updates, and can auto-select the closest Indian state using geolocation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthControls.ts: Wraps Internet Identity to provide login/logout helpers, status flags, and cache-clearing on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a context provider and hook for managing Dfinity Internet Identity authentication and state persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeration.ts: Stores muted/blocked users in localStorage and filters messages while providing mute/unmute and block/unblock utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for rooms, messages, and user actions, wrapping backend actor calls with caching and polling support.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Manages unified user profiles, loading from backend when authenticated or local storage when anonymous, with auto-creation and update logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and a subtle background image overlay.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Displays a chat room view with messages, header controls, and a composer using live-polling message queries.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login UI with Internet Identity flow, handling redirects and login errors.
frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Shows rooms filtered by location, supports search and authenticated room creation, and handles navigation to chat rooms.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders the settings UI, handling location access, area selection, nickname updates, profile creation, and login/logout actions.
Manages anonymous profile generation and persistence in localStorage, including random IDs, nicknames, colors, and avatars.
frontend/src/storage/areaSelectionStorag: Loads and saves the user's area selection to localStorage and defines available areas including an 'All areas' option.
frontend/src/utils/auth/isAuthError.ts: Detects authentication-related backend errors by matching message patterns.
frontend/src/utils/auth/postLoginRedirec: Stores, retrieves, and clears a postâ€‘login redirect path in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/location/closestIndia: Computes the closest Indian state to given coordinates using the Haversine distance formula.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash query parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, plugins, and content scanning.
project_state.json: Defines the project state metadata, issue list, and notes that this is a production rebuild request with no functional changes.
